eventsHeader: YOUR NEXT MEANINGFUL EVENT IS HERE
findYourLocalCentre: Find your local Dharma Centre (click on its marker)
SelectTheEvent: Select the classes you wish to book
LoginBeforeBooking: Please login before submitting your booking
GuestDetails: Please enter your personal details below
OrBookUsingAccount: or book as a returning user
PaymentInformation: Please enter your payment information in the secure portal {0}, our payment provider. We do not store any credit card information.
ThankYouForBooking: Thank you for your booking. You will receive an email with all the details as soon as your availability is confirmed.
PaymentCancelled: Your payment has been cancelled, and all the un-paid options have been automatically removed from your booking. If you wish to book them again, you can do so by clicking on the button below.
PaymentAndBookingCancelled: Your payment has been cancelled, as well as your booking. If you wish to un-cancel it, you can do so by clicking on the button below.
PaymentFailedMessage: Your payment has failed. Please retry a payment, or cancel your booking.
PaymentPendingMessage: Your payment is in a pending state. The bank can take a few days to process the payment. As soon as more information from the bank, we'll update your booking state.
ErrorWhileInsertingBooking: An error has occurred while processing your registration. Please try again later.
ErrorWhileInitiatingPayment: An error has occurred during payment initialization. Your registration has been processed, but payment has not yet been made.
ErrorWhileLoadingPaymentForm: An error has occurred during connection to the payment platform. Your registration has been processed, but payment has not yet been made.
ErrorWhileInitializingHTMLPaymentForm: An error has occurred while creating the payment form. Your registration has been processed, but payment has not yet been made.
ErrorPaymentGatewayFailure: An error has occurred while verifying payment information through the payment gateway. Your registration has been processed, but payment is still required.
ErrorPaymentModalityFailure: A communication error has occurred between the payment gateway and our server. The payment request has not been processed. Your registration has been processed, but the payment has not yet been made.
ErrorWhileCancelingTheBooking: An error has occurred while canceling your booking. Please contact us at info@manjushri.org
PreviousBookedDate: History of the past booked date:
FacilityFee: I'm a Manjushri KMC Member or Overnight Volunteer
AddFamilyOrFriends: Add your family or friends information here
PrivacyNotice: Privacy and legal information regarding the use of data
YourWalletPayments: Your credit card information and past payments
Name: Name

GenericSearch.prompt: Search here to narrow the list

EventSearch.prompt: Enter the event name to narrow the list

Phone.prompt: Mobile no. preferred (in case we need to contact you urgently)
